name: Final-10
description: CS 290 Final Project Code and demo due by 5:00pm on Friday, 6/15/2018 In this course, a final programming project will take the place of formal exams to test your understanding of the material.  The final project will involve working with a team of 3-4 people to implement a substantial web app that utilizes all of the major components of the web application stack covered in this class.  Specifically, you and your teammates will write a web app that satisfies all of these requirements:
